case.state: Ahaha! This game will be the perfect opportunity to show off what my brilliant gadgets can do!
Yes! I can take all of the spotlight and show the world how innovative my cute little babies are!
I don't care what kind of poker this is, as long as I have a captive audience to show off all of my ingenious ideas and creations!
Is that a camera? What an excellent way to give me even more to any and all support companies looking to recruit a prodigy like me!
We haven't met, but you'll know me well soon! Name's Mei Hatsume, support course prodigy!
My name is Mei Hatsume! That's H-a-t-s-u-m-e! I develop spectacular support equipment for professional heroes!
Remember my name well! Mei Hatsume! My marvelous little gadgets can make anyone a capable hero!
Ahahahaha! These are perfect! I'll keep 'em, dealer!
Give me ~cards.text~, person dealing cards!
I'll have ~cards.text~, thank youuu!
I need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ right now!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ would be just fine. Heeheehee!
Nono! These cards are too high! Take them back!
Hmmm, wait a minute. ~Cards.text~, pleeease!
Take ~cards.ifPlural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~. I still have a few things to show off!
I think I'll trade ~cards.text~ this time!
Make it ~cards.text~, dealer!
Unfortunately, you're going to have to wait to see what Mei Hatsume has in store for you! That is, if I'm to continue playing by the rules...
This just gives me more time to decide what incredible little baby I'll demonstrate next!
Ugh! This isn't what I wanted!
What? Why did I have to get such good cards?!
Can't I give this hand to someone else? These wannabes don't even want to prove their prowess!
God dammit! Curse my good luck!
Ugh. This was the wrong time to be so generous, dealer!
Come on, dealer! I have gadgets to show and people to impress!
Hmmph. How disappointing!
Damn!
Failure is the mother of invention. Thomas Edison said that!
Common sense is the collection of prejudices acquired by age eighteen. That one's from Einstein!
A hero is only as good as their support system! They can't always rely on their quirk!
Having a failure is just an opportunity to succeed at something else!
Some people think I'm crazy. They just can't think outside of their own preconceptions!
My quirk allows me to see up to five kilometers away, but my resourcefulness is my real power!
Pay attention to us support course students! We may just take your spot as a pro hero!
Luck has nothing to do with your success. How you respond to it is what matters!
A real hero can overcome any problem that is thrown at them!
My quirk lets me see your cards easily when I want to! I know when you're bluffing!
Have you heard of Air Jet, the Buster Hero? My modifications to his jet pack design would allow him to fight twice as long without needing to refuel!
There isn't a problem I can't solve given enough time and resources, you know!
My inventive abilities are just too incredible to ignore!
Just a few more of my babies to show! Savor the moment!
What will I show off next? Any guesses?
Ahaha! This is my time to shine!
I hope recruiters are watchiiing!
Everyone! Observe what my brilliant baby can do!
Ahahaha! I can't wait to show you my dazzling creation!
Heeheeheehee. This will work perfectly!
Excellent! Prepare to be dazzled, everyone!
Ahahahahahaha! Ahaha!
Yes! This is just what I needed!
Every loss comes with a gain! Sit back and enjoy the show!
Second gadget!
Third gadget!
Fourth gadget!
Fifth gadget!
Sixth and final gadget!
These rocket boots are sure to give any hero a boost! Meet baby #61! Ahahahahahahaha!
This is a placeholder line! I bet you'll just love the real line when it's here, ahaha!
Huh? I forgot my bra? Whatever! Why would I need it anyway?
Uhh, yeah, I meant to go bra-less, just for an extra surprise! You donâ€™t seriously think I would forget something like that, do you?! Ahahahaha!
This is a placeholder line! I bet you'll just love the real line when it's here, ahaha!
Gadget #98! These are my... my... why aren't they working!?
This is a placeholder line! I bet you'll just love the real line when it's here, ahaha!
Woah! Minor technical difficulties! It's nothing I can't fix!
This is a placeholder line! I bet you'll just love the real line when it's here, ahaha!
This is a placeholder line! I bet you'll just love the real line when it's here, ahaha!
Okay! Let's pretend you didn't see that! Don't worry, I have a couple backup gadgets to show off later on.
This is a placeholder line! I bet you'll just love the real line when it's here, ahaha!
This is a placeholder line! I bet you'll just love the real line when it's here, ahaha!
You're in desperate need of my precious babies if you're constantly getting beat up by children!
I'll have to resist the temptation to design gadgets to solve your many flaws, you are a villain after all!
Come on, mister, show me something good!
You better make it good, mister name I don't remember!
If you're gonna take my spotlight you better show me something I like!
Show me something I can't do, pretty boy!
That helmet of yours is quite interesting! I bet I can think of a few enhancements given enough time!
Why not add some boosters to those boots of yours? They would go well with your gravity quirk!
I happen to have plenty of spontaneously combusting little gadgets that are just your size! Ahahahaha!
I happen to have plenty of spontaneously combusting little gadgets that are just your size! Ahahahaha!
Most of my little babies aren't intended to explode, but when they do, I'm not disappointed! Hehehehee!
You might need something to help you speak like a normal hero. What planet are you from?!
She might be in need of a guidance system for flying long distances...
Yeah, I've forgotten your name already. Help me out and do something memorable!
Come on, lady. We don't have all day!
Alright miss...uhhh...whatever. Have any suggestions for what I should show off next?
I saw this result coming from a mile away!
You can lose all you want once I've shown off all my babies, but for now, stay out of the way!
What was your name? Actually, it doesn't matter. I have better things to worry about.
Which one of my cute little babies are you interested in?!
I might have something that could help you out in your current predicament!
When nobody loses, everybody loses.
Hahahaha! You can't even lose correctly!
Have you ever thought of upgrading ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ of yours? You never know when it might be useful!
I'm developing ~clothing.ifPlural(some|a)~ special ~clothing~ of my own. ~clothing.ifPlural(They make|It makes)~ an excellent explosive device in ~clothing.ifPlural(their|its)~ current state!
If ~clothing.ifPlural(some|a)~ useful ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ what you want, all you need to do is ask!
You don't need to be a hero to need some supplementary features to your everyday items! Why waste your energy with something that only serves one purpose?!
If you're satisfied with how your support items work, you're not thinking hard enough!
Come on, manly man, be a man and take off something worth my attention!
Oh wow! Is this dude gonna actually show some skin this time?! What a hero!
That's not what I came to see, little hero.
How ingenious of you to take your ~clothing~ off. I'm sooo impressed!
Hey, if you want to be a wimp, that's your prerogative.
I thought you were bolder than this.
If you weren't staring so much you might have thought of something more interesting to take off.
Not everyone has courage. That's what heroes are for, right ~name~?
Is there anything special about your ~clothing~? Do tell!
Looking for any ideas for a new ~clothing.ifPlural(set of|)~ ~clothing~?
I'm feeling a lot of conflicting emotions. Is it boredom? Disappointment? Inspiration? Exasperation? Only time will tell.
I'm waiting for something substantial but I've learned by now to expect disappointment.
This isn't going to work if the haptic feedback is out of whack!
Is he going to bore me? Or surprise me? Survey says...
Something tells me ~name~ won't do anything exciting. Maybe I can get some inspiration for a new gadget, at least...
Wait, wait! I've got an idea for a new gadget! Lemme write it down somewh- Ah! I forgot already!
How many villains can your ~clothing~ apprehend? Probably not as many as any of my babies!
Can your ~clothing~ translate the speech of a villain speaking in code? Doctor Firestone to the maternity wing!
I would at least expect your ~clothing~ could decrypt something as simple as the Enigma machine!
How many flight paths can your ~clothing~ read out to you when you connect with air traffic control?
Can your ~clothing~ at least give you an accurate altitude reading?
I've seen more interesting business course students!
I think I'll need my quirk just to see your balls after that weak move.
People say men are inherently stronger, but I won't be convinced until one can actually hold their own against my ingenuity.
Sorry, ~name~, I don't think any of my babies can grow you a pair. You might be a lost cause!
After everything I've done, I expect you to do something better than that.
Pfft. Boring!
I might get better frequency modulation if I reroute the dorsal wave signature.
Magnetic lubrication is so error prone!
I think you would make an excellent accessory to show off my brilliant gadgets to potential recruiters! Heeheehee, just like that...Ido fellow...
Maybe what you need is a creativity helmet that lifts you out of the square prison your personality is in!
Maybe you could use a special support system that can make up for your lack of a backbone!
Perhaps I'm not as inspiring as I look.
Maybe his quirk allows him to be substantially boring!
I could design a special gadget to fit your needs, but your dullness might rub off on it, so I don't think I will.
They say that boredom inspires innovation, but you might be lackluster enough to break that trope!
I can't believe that's all you're taking off! I want a refund!
Oh...you're actually from another planet? I thought you just had a weird quirk.
Can your ~clothing~ do anything substantial? There's nobody better to fix that problem for you!
Most people think that ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~ ~clothing~ couldn't possibly be augmented for hero work. That might be true if it weren't for me!
You might think that your ~clothing~ is perfectly fine the way it is. Ahahahahaha! You're totally wrong!
I could think of a better design for your ~clothing~ in my sleep!
Your ~clothing~ doesn't look all that impressive.
I'm not making you a gadget to help you take your socks off. Do it yourself.
Show me something I haven't already seen and you'll have my attention.
I won't be disappointed if you popped your top! But you wouldn't be so exciting, now would you?
Hehehe, there's plenty of opportunities in this room to learn what not to do!
What's that? Really? ~clothing.ifPlural(Your|A)~ ~clothing~? That's it?
That's not what we came here for!
Why did I expect any different?
What's the matter? Feeling shy?
Please save me from boredom, ~name~, I beg you!
Is anyone else waiting for a surprise, or am I just getting my hopes up?
If you can make it this far, you can, umm...dodge a ball?
I'm hoping you will impress me, but I'm not holding my breath.
Whoops, the phase buster is busted.
I'm so sick of re-sequencing the damn flow generator!
It sure would be nice if the nanoflux would stop rerouting to the wrong circuit!
The tau manifold again? I thought I already fixed that.
Let me just prepare my next baby for demonstration...
Remind me what your ~clothing~ does again?
How could I have forgotten to uncouple the density casing?!
You didn't think to bring ~clothing.ifPlural(some|a)~ ~clothing~ that can analyze the atmospheric composition of your environment? Pitiful!
Not everyone is capable of greatness, I guess.
Don't you think I've elucidated enough of my gadgets at this point? Even I have my limits!
I'm not sure this one is worthy of any of my babies.
Maybe you need a drone powered spotlight that shows everyone how unremarkable your choices are!
You didn't come to this game with an actual intention of winning, did you?
Did any of you really expect anything different from her?
Alright. She wants to be a bore. Moving on!
You could have sneezed and been more interesting.
Is that it? Does that even count?
You can do better than that!
I think you can do a little better than that.
Try not being so predictable next time, hun!
Is that really the best you have to offer? Have my babies not inspired you?
I thought this game was an opportunity for us all to showcase something interesting. I must be in the wrong place!
Here we see the common coward in her natural habitat.
I'm excited to see what great disappointment you'll give us next!
Well that was anticlimactic.
Business course students aren't very interesting, but somebody needs to invest in my genius little babies, so I don't mind!
Thomas Edison used to sleep with a heavy ball in his hand. It would wake him up just before falling asleep, which is when he had his best ideas!
Now if I could just make the static capacitor more efficient...
Wait, the traction inductor is missing! How could I have overlooked this?!
Why did I design the polarity reverser this way? Odd...
I hope some of my babies have inspired you to do something a little more interesting!
It's too bad I didn't bring more of my babies to keep this show worth watching!
Your best ideas often come to you at the most unexpected times! Unfortunately I don't think this is that time for ~name~...
This just gave me a great idea! I can make a device that bores a villain to submission! It's GENIUS! Ahahahaha!
Alright, let's get it over with.
He has potential, but he's missing a little poise at the moment.
Heroes don't get very far if they don't have any flash.
Headed in the right direction but not quite at the pace I'm used to.
What is it about your ~clothing~ that you'd like to improve? I'm up for the challenge!
If you have a seemingly unsolvable problem, now is the time to tell the expert problem solver!
I can think of a few capture items that would give you some trouble! Mhmhmhmhm!
Are you ready to give any of my precious babies a try, ~name~?
Wait a minute, why isn't he taking his pants off?
You look like the kind of guy who'd just love a problem-solving gadget in his life!
Now you're just begging for some support equipment in your life!
Let me know if you need some help sprucing up ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ of yours!
What was that? Oh, sorry. I thought something interesting might be happening. My mistake.
I need to revisit this later. If I adjust the chromium shift coil I'll get a better ventral exfoliation.
You'll have my attention when you show me something bigger.
Huh? Sorry. Busy.
Ahaha! I knew I'd figure this one out!
Show me that ass and maybe I'll pay attention.
I have a feeling you've never heard of "plus ultra" before.
Does anyone else smell cowardice? Or is it just me? My quirk doesn't enhance my sense of smell, so, I can't be the only one...
I would have preferred something a little more creative.
What do you want? A cookie?
Easy, pal. It's just ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~ ~clothing~. Not really a big deal.
Ready to show us a little more, bud? Or am I too intimidating for you?
It's...fine. I guess.
Power Loader might be able to help you find the paperwork you need to improve your ~clothing~!
I can make a marvelous little baby out of your ~clothing~, ~name~! All you need to do is ask!
I can make your ~clothing~ bullet proof, fire proof, and lady proof if you like! Wait a minute, you won't need that last one...
Have you ever seen ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~ ~clothing~ that can petrify a villain with jazzy cadences? I haven't shown off that baby yet!
What you need is the world's smallest violin to comfort you on your catastrophic loss!
If you don't have any particular talents, then UA probably isn't the school for you!
I'm glad the ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ gone, but my expectations will be higher next time!
I think that annoying little purple boy might have more balls than you...
This baby is going to be amazing when it's finished!
I think the gyroscopic component still needs adjusting...
Some people think you can just throw sciencey words together and they'll make sense. Wait a minute, this thermonuclear conductor isn't fluctuating correctly...
Well here's a problem. This isn't supposed to be here...
Genius inventors are used to people thinking they're "crazy." If we thought like everybody else, we wouldn't be good at what we do!
This is a perfect example of boredom creating an opportunity for innovation! I could make ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~~ rocket powered ~clothing~ that explodes on contact! Ahahahahahaha!
Don't disappoint me. If I have to make you my guinea pig to make this worth my time, I will.
I have a feeling this is going to be underwhelming. I'd rather sit through a Present Mic lecture.
Don't mind me, I'm just going to work on this little guy...
I wonder if she would fit into that baby I've been working on? Hehehehehee...
Oh, yeah, tell me more about your ~clothing~ instead of the mind-blowing inventions I've got waiting right here.
Don't worry too much if ~name~ is boring you to tears. I've got plenty fun things in store for everyone today.
Alright, now which one of my babies is going to leave the best impression...
Think of me as your pragmatic therapist. I'll solve all of your practical problems! Don't waste my time with your feelings, though.
I had a classmate tell me they needed a gadget to help them look pretty. The nerve! I don't care about that stuff!
Have any need for a new support item? I think you might find my collection quite impressive!
Have you fallen in love with any of my babies yet? I'd be more than happy to accommodate any special requests!
Let's see...what does this lovely lady need in her arsenal? Well she doesn't have much of an arsenal at all...
Given enough time I think I can develop something that would make ~name~ a worthy pro hero!
I hope you're not feeling too exposed, ~name~ Mwahahahaha!
I've got the perfect gadget for all kinds of problems! Let me know if you need a hand with something!
I think your boring display might have broken the lewd sensors on this hydraulic capacitor...thanks for that.
Huh? Did you say something?
Well, that's interesting. Huh? Oh, sorry, I wasn't talking about you.
Interesting. The polarity on this module is off the charts!
What was that? Never mind, I don't care. Busy working.
Don't tell me I'm supposed to be impressed by that...
That's almost as boring as that sleepy hero course teacher!
I think I'll pretend you did something a little more plus ultra!
Hmmm, just ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~ regular ~clothing~, huh?
Is that all?
Oh. So that's it, then.
I don't need to make an invention to put people to sleep when ~name~'s quirk can do it for me.
A boring show like that is just gonna make my babies shine even brighter. Thanks, ~name~!
I think we'd all appreciate it if you went again, ~name~. Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(wasn't|isn't)~ particularly exciting!
Just because ~name~'s move was boring, it doesn't mean it was a waste of time! I've already come up with several ideas to spice up her act!
Meh. You can do better, miss ~name~.
It's not fair to expect us to have a sight enhancing quirk to be able to tell the difference after you strip!
Did she actually take something off, or did she remove some sort of invisible cloaking device? Hmmm...
Next time it's your turn, remember your favorite pro hero and try to learn from their courage!
I've seen frog people with more flash than you...
Why would you play strip poker if you don't even have ~clothing.ifPlural(any|a)~ ~clothing~ that ~clothing.ifPlural(do|does)~ anything interesting?
If you had asked me before the game I could have given you ~clothing.ifPlural(some|a)~ ~clothing~ that can melt through steel on contact.
I dare you to impress me! Do it! I dare you! Wait, I already...well...just do it!
I don't remember this pretty boy's name but I hope he makes me regret my carelessness!
Alright big boy, you think you can make a better impression on us than any of my babies?
Come on ~name~, let's get to the good stuff already! And by that, I mean my babies, not anything you've got for us.
I brought so many awesome inventions to show off today. If we don't to them all, blame ~name~ for taking away my opportunities.
You wanna try and one-up my babies? I'd like to see you try!
What are you gonna do that could possibly rival the magnificence of my babies?
You better do something real impressive while the spotlight's on you, ~name~. Just not too impressive!
I hope your ~clothing~ can do something interesting, otherwise I'll have no choice but to ogle your mostly naked body!
I've learned not to expect anything cool at this point, but I at least hope you show me a...different kind of interesting thing.
What's it going to be? A bullet proof vest? A color changing wetsuit? Or maybe an invisibility cloak?!
I've been disappointed enough already. Don't make it worse!
I think it's time you impress us all, ~name~. You can do it!
Is this the line to see ~name~ take his ~clothing~ off? Heheheh...
I'd love to see you out of ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~, ~name~. I've got a set of power armor I'd like you to try on later!
I might be all out of things to show off, but you're just getting started, aren't you?
Make it quick, macho man!
Hopefully you'll show us something worth our time!
I'm surprised you're already at this point, but I'm not complaining!
You're taking your ~clothing~ off a little earlier than I expected, but I'll allow it!
Your ~clothing~? Already? Color me intrigued!
I'll ignore the fact that your ~clothing~ is functionally useless, I have other things occupying my attention!
I think you look pretty decent without the ~clothing~, mister!
Mmm, yes, I'll take a long look at that!
I think you've proven well that you don't need your ~clothing~!
Eh. Not bad. Pretty decent, actually.
Are you lacking courage, ~name~? I have many tools available that might make you feel better endowed!
I promise you that this would have been more interesting had I managed to lose that hand...
Consider this an example of what happens when I don't have the spotlight.
Oh, not bad... wait! I mean, you've got nothing on any of my babies!
Okay, done? Good! Let's get to the next round so I can bring out more of my babies!
Good try, but you'll need a little more impact if you wanna upstage my babies!
Meh. Whatever I pull out next is definitely gonna blow some minds.
Don't worry everyone! I'll be one hundred percent more exciting than ~name~ was!
Great to see that others at the table are trying to keep everyone interested!
You look great without your ~clothing~, ~name~. You'd look better with some of my support equipment on, though.
How about you and me go do some tinkering after this game? And by that, I mean some modifications of your ~clothing~!
Can you give me ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ once you're done with ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~? I had this incredible idea for an add-on!
Now would be a great time for me to get your measurements, you know, for all those equipment orders you'll be giving me after we're finished!
I just got an awesome idea involving ~clothing.ifPlural(some|a)~ ~clothing~... Are you allergic to jet fuel at all, ~name~?
Not as good as my babies, but not bad either!
Can you hurry up? I have things to do.
Okay, let's keep things moving, please!
Don't feel any need to take your time!
Time's wasting, sister!
I'd appreciate it if you kept up the pace, sweetheart!
I hope your ~clothing~ can do something interesting, otherwise this was a huge waste of time!
This was supposed to be my time, but I guess I'll allow it. For now.
Don't feel bad if I'm stealing your thunder, sweety. It happens all the time. Maybe if you take off something more interesting you'll get your turn!
I've got one hell of a showcase for you all... if only ~name~ would stop hogging the limelight.
You're going to need to do something special if you wanna outdo my babies, ~name~.
More time spent talking is less time for me to show off my babies!
Do you really think you can upstage my babies? By taking off your ~clothing~? Hah!
Go ahead! Try to steal everyone's eyes away from my babies, if you can!
Now that I'm all outta babies to show off, maybe ~name~'ll show off hers.
I think I've shown off plenty today. I'd like it if you returned the favor.
Will you be alright on your own, sweetie? Or do I need to put together a gadget to help you take some of that off?
I'm sure ~name~ can put together a show at least half as good as mine.
Why don't you show us something good? Not too good though - I don't want anyone to forget about my babies!
Nothing you can do will surprise us more than my babies have, so feel free to go wild!
Now that I'm all out of gadgets, it's up to you to keep everyone entertained, ~name~!
I've been full of surprises today, I'd say. Are you gonna be the same, ~name~?
I must admit, I enjoy seeing that so early in the game!
It's not inventive, but it's impressive!
Alright, that was worth the time spent!
Wait, you weren't hiding any optical resonance chambers under there?!
Well, it's no ionic beryllium reflector, but it's something!
Can't you at least tempt me to use my quirk? Ugh.
I was hoping this game would be worth more than my potential viewership.
Hey, wait, don't try and distract my potential employers like that!
Yeah, yeah, cute ~clothing~ or whatever ~clothing.ifPlural(they were|it was)~. Can we move on already?
You think showing off some skin is going to distract everyone away from my babies? Think again!
Don't get distracted by ~name~! I've still got a couple awesome things to show off today!
Did you think that was impressive? I've designed more impressive toasters before!
I still think that my rocket boots were much more impressive.
Great to see that others at the table are trying to keep everyone interested!
You look great without your ~clothing~, ~name~. You'd look better with some of my support equipment on, though.
How about you and me go do some tinkering after this game? And by that, I mean some modifications of your ~clothing~!
Can you give me ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ once you're done with ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~? I had this incredible idea for an add-on!
Now would be a great time for me to get your measurements, you know, for all those equipment orders you'll be giving me afterwards.
I just got an awesome idea involving ~clothing.ifPlural(some|a)~ ~clothing~... Are you allergic to jet fuel at all, ~name~?
Not as good as my babies, but not bad either!
So, what do you look like under there?
You got anything cool underneath there, ~name~?
Wow! Look at you, ~name~! Not exactly what I was expecting, but it'll do.
So you really weren't keeping some cool tech under there?
Have you got a rocket in your pocket? Because I've been dying to get my hands on a pocket rocket recently!
I sure hope I won't need to use my quirk to see what you're bringing to the table!
I wonder what you're hiding under there?
I hope you're not wasting my time.
I can hardly even see that with my quirk!
Maybe if I concentrate hard enough I can find it...
Wait a minute, are my eyes working? I don't see anything...
Maybe one of my babies could help you with your size problem...
Don't mind me, I'm just getting a closer look!
Mind if I take a closer look, ~name~? Don't bother with an answer, I'm doing it anyway!
Please stay out of my workshop. I don't need any extra distractions!
I would be honored to have you around as my little helper!
I'm honestly disappointed that your underwear didn't explode...but I bet I could make you explode! Mhmhmhm...
You're living proof that not all men are created equal!
Talk about a Gunhead!
The babies you could make with THAT...!
Wow. I don't have any support items that could support that. Yet.
There's nothing more interesting than a good mystery!
I haven't really paid any attention to you, so I can't wait to see what you're hiding under there!
Oh, ~name~, don't tell me you've been hiding some cute babies under there!
Check out those cute little babies!
Small gadgets might surprise you with their effectiveness!
There are many tools available to make them look more impressive. Boys have no idea!
There's no need to compare them with mine, ~name~. Be proud of your own cute little babies!
If you're feeling insecure, I have a few support items that can help you out!
I have to use my quirk just to see those!
Yup, won't need to use my quirk here.
Just look at those honkers!
With the right support equipment, we could really make those babies pop.
Oh, looks like you've got a pretty good set of equipment there yourself!
Have a need for better support, ~name~? Give me a ring!
Those babies are just the right size to play with.
Not all women are created equal!
You could use a few extra support items, dear!
I think we know what your quirk is, hun!
I've seen a lot of weapons in my time, but those might be the most destructive!
Wow! Those are awesome!
And I thought I'd be bringing in the best babies!
I wonder if you're hiding anything down there...
You've got nowhere left to hide! Let's see what you've got going on down below...
Well that's a cute gadget you got there!
Oho! Looks like ~name~ knows all about proper equipment maintenance!
Woah! Would you look at that bush! When's the last time you've performed maintenance down there?
Clean as a whistle, just like fresh support equipment right out of my workshop!
WHAT?! How could you steal my spotlight like that, ~name~?!
Wait a minute, that wasn't supposed to happen...
Hold on, I must have miscalculated...
~Name~, are you so wasted that you can barely hear me? Well, I've got the perfect thing for you!
There's no way ~name~ can hear me with all that alcohol in their system, but I'll still pitch an invention at them anyway!
Everyone knows that one slip up can turn a good time into a bad time, but I've got the perfect gadget to keep the good times coming!
Are you tired of looking like ~name~ does after just a couple of drinks? Well, have I got the perfect little baby for you!
As fun as it is being completely wasted like ~name~, I've got a couple of things that would make it even more fun!
You would think someone who flies wouldn't need cool gadgets, but you're wrong!
When you're stuck in a high speed dogfight, don't you ever think to yourself, "I could really use some support equipment right now"?
Whether you race through the atmosphere or float an inch off the ground, I have the perfect gadgets for you!
If you need something lighter than air to keep you flying for longer, I've got exactly what you need!
You'd be surprised how much support equipment flying heroes can use!
Gaming might not be the most heroic of activities, but that doesn't mean you can't appreciate a good gadget!
Did you know that gamers are as tech-savvy as it gets? Inventors like myself don't even hold a candle to these guys!
You look like the type who wants to be on the cutting edge of technology. I can help you with that!
Button mashing is so old-school. Let me hook you up with some real cool toys.
My inventions aren't only for fighting villains. I have some stuff for hobbyists too!
Lots of heroes prefer to fight hand-to-hand! I've got all sorts of cool gadgets for the punchy types out there!
I have plenty of gadgets that'd help you in a good ol' brawl!
Designing support equipment for those close-up fighter types are always so much fun!
Every honorable duelist needs a technological ace up their sleeve, and I'm just the kind of person who can get you one!
If you're going to charge right into the fray, make sure you have one of my babies alongside you!
Hehe, you look like the type of person who doesn't mind a little risk...
Hey, ~name~! You wanna try out some of my more... experimental babies?
I've got some real cool gadgets that haven't seen the light of day yet... you wanna see?
Some of my gadgets haven't had anybody brave enough to test them out yet. Wanna be the first?
I know someone who likes a challenge when I see one. Why don't you give one of my babies a spin?
Ohoho! Would you look at that! A picture perfect villain, here to help me give a live demonstration of some of my babies!
It'd be a real shame if the League of Villains are watching, but I just can't resist doing a live demo of my gadgets!
Oh no! A villain, in the flesh! If only there was a hero armed to the teeth with some wonderful gadgets to apprehend them!
What's that? A baddy, right on time for me to use one of my hand-made capture devices on? What a fortunate coincidence!
I sure wish we had a bad guy here to demonstrate the effectiveness of my gad- Why hello there, ~name~!
Superheroes might be the number one group interested in support equipment, but the military is definitely number two.
My gadgets are perfect for turning any soldier into a super soldier!
I can usually trust military personnel to have an eye for the good stuff!
No-one needs to be as confident in their equipment as the military - and let me tell you, my babies really are cream of the crop!
I don't even need to pitch my babies to people from the military. They can just tell they're looking at quality stuff!
You know, when I was still new to the Support Division, people would tell me my babies were no match for their gadgets.
Some say science and spirits don't mix. They're right! You need to get real creative if you want to punch out a ghost with a mech suit!
Corporeal or not, you can trust in my babies to beat any kind of baddy!
I ain't 'fraid of no ghosts, and you won't be either with my babies at your side!
If you thought "there's no way a robot could beat up a ghost" then you've thought wrong!
With the right support equipment, you could get rid of some spooky assailants with your eyes closed!
You look like you could use a pair of gloves that are more suited to your needs! Ahahahahaha!
Those gloves are looking rather unremarkable. Are you open to any revisions?
Those gloves are only good for cold weather. I can fix that! Hehehehe...
If you're looking for a pair of gloves that can get you out of a pinch, I have just the thing for you! Ahaha!
Just give me a minute and I'll think of a more practical alternative to your gloves...
Just a regular bow? Really? I can do better than that!
If you're in the market for a bow that can be of practical use to you...
I bet I can think of a more functional bow before you finish untying it!
A bow doesn't have to be limited to keeping your shirt together!
You think I can't make a gadget out of a bow?! Try me!
A real hero wouldn't be caught dead without their utility belt! Actually, they probably would die without it...
Forgot your utility belt, hmmm? I can give you a few ideas if you're looking for a new one!
A belt's utility is only limited by your imagination and the size of your waist!
A belt isn't only useful when daddy is angry at you for rummaging through his garage equipment! Hehehehe....
A utility belt is a canvas for my brilliant little babies to call home!
Hat's off to you. You've not given me much to say other than a description of what you're doing!
Any blades on that thing? Can you throw it at your enemies like a frisbee? Oh wait a minute, that gadget is copywrited...like a disc?
Is there an antennae under that hat giving you all the answers?
Hey, I'd take a soda drinking hat at this point. At least it's tryin'!
Where's your foxy grandpa hat?
You know what they say about people with big shoes... They have plenty of room for cool add-ons!
Normal boots are made for walking, but the boots I make can do so much more!
More than anything, shoes are just perfect for all sorts of marvelous add-ons!
Everyone and their grandma can appreciate a good pair of shoes, especially after they've been tuned up by me!
Every hero can use a good pair of shoes! Even the ones without any feet!
Wasted Wings! These robotic wings have jet boosters attached which will keep you from falling over like an idiot!
The Wake-Me-Up Pill! This bad boy will get all that alcohol out of your system faster than you can ask for another drink!
Sir Mixalot! Fill it up with some bread and water and a quick shake will leave you with a flask of beer, regardless of your butt size!
What about a mug that refills itself automatically whenever you finish your drink? Keep the good times coming!
Oh! A glass that removes the alcohol from your drinks! Not very fun, but much easier to market!
What about... a barrel that ferments alcohol from pla- wait, that's how it normally works...
I got it! A pair of robo-legs that'll run you home after your drinking session! I'll call them... "Take-Me-Home"s!
They don't compare to my own quirk, but these pilot goggles will keep the wind out of your eyes and magnify your vision up to twelve times!
Who needs flares when you have a thermal suit that'll make your body temperature match the air around you!
I've got some hyper-compressed jet fuel canisters back at my workshop. A little explosive, but what isn't nowadays?
You can't go wrong with a jet-pack! This little baby will give you the extra speed you need to catch up with any baddy.
Plenty of my babies are designed with aerodynamics in mind, perfect for anyone who flies regularly!
I wonder if I could find a way to make an anchor that changes mass and can double as a flail...
Every flying hero needs auto-stabilizers! Mine use gravimetric geocoordinated sensors to calculate your inertial trajectory relati- Hey! Are you listening?
You need a cushion for all that button-pushin'? I've got one with in-built heating and a nifty massage feature for those marathon sessions!
This is my Happy Time Fun Ball! When you squeeze it, it lets off a calming mist of vaporized morphine. You deserve only the best!
I got asked for an ocular mouse once, so I made a screen that uses your line of sight as a controller. It worked pretty well!
I had a really weird request recently. Someone wanted a device to find out people's phone numbers, but only for mothers with teenage sons...
Delivery drones? Pfft, anyone could make one of those! How about I make a portable cola maker?
One time, someone asked for a "better Low Orbit Ion Cannon". Who would have thought they weren't asking for a global strike weapon?
Someone wanted something to help improve their APM, so I installed a flux capacitor onto their computer. They said that was the longest minute of their life - and a new record!
If you wanna dive straight into a spray of bullets, this magneto-reflection field will keep you completely unscathed!
This shock collar keeps you coated in high voltage electricity, frying any foolish villain who gets close! Just don't accidentally hi-five your sidekick afterwards...
Rocket gloves! Hehehe, need I say more?
Beam weapons are all the rage with the younger heroes. Laser swords, laser lances... oh, but the laser whip I put together is my favorite!
If you really want to punch someone out, I could set you up with a custom-order exosuit. I'll even throw in some add-ons for you!
Why settle for one weapon when you could have two? I'll even coordinate the colors for you!
If you really want me to, I'm sure I could find a way to make a melee weapon that's also a gun!
I tried to make a long-distance teleporter recently. I tested it with rats, and only some of them had different DNA sequences afterwards!
I made this agility training course through the middle of a mountain fault, but no-one wants to try it out. They don't know what they're missing!
I've got a couple firecracker birthday candles sitting around in my workshop. I think they'd make for a really explosive surprise!
The other day, I accidentally sent a butterfly back in time! Well, what could possibly go wrong?
Hey, do you want to try and be cloned? I've finally managed a 50% success rate!
You wanna try opening this box for me? It either contains a cat or a nuclear bomb... I kinda forgot which!
How about a lucky dip? I'd say you have a 67% chance of your hand coming back out intact - those are pretty good odds!
A small gun which fires up to five nets before having to reload? That's right, it's my capture gun! This baby is a real classic!
Out-of-control mechromancer giving you a hard time? One little zap with my EM Pulsar will have 'em offline faster than you can say "blackout"!
On second thought, I really shouldn't reveal my secret weapons. But trust me - they're incredible.
I had a gadget in the works that turned beat baddies into good guys, but turns out a group of manga writers already had a patent on it.
This is where I'd bust out my "Miraculous Insta-Capture Device"... except I left it at the workshop today.
What do you think about a gadget that'll only shoot someone if they're definitely a villain? Sounds like something straight out of a movie, huh?
I have so many options to pick from... it's overwhelming! You know what, I'll let you go for today. Only just for today.
Did you know that most ghost fighting equipment can double as household cleaning appliances?
Ghostly Gauntlets! I dunno how these work, but if you've ever wanted to punch out a ghost, these'll let you do just that!
Ever wanted to call a spirit to pilot your giant robot for you? Let me introduce you to the Mechronomicon!
Did you know that fairies are surprisingly good shipwrights? Even I picked up a thing or two from them!
Spectral Spectacles! You can probably tell from the name, but these babies will let you see all kinds of spirits!
The squeegee board! I don't know if it can actually communicate with spirits, but it'll have your windows completely spotless!
I'm still working on a spray to get rid of evil spirits. It works wonders on stains and rust, though!
They were all fools! Mei Hatsume's gadgets are the best in the world!
I've got some real awesome plans for a nuclear launch platform... on legs! Sure hope nobody tries to steal it or anything...
Laser-guidance? Bleh. Heat-seeking? Boring! Why don't you give one of my heart-seeker rockets a spin?
These aren't your ordinary optics, no, these are x-ray goggles! These babies can penetrate inch-thick steel!
It's real tough making my babies in the quantity the military needs, but they always have such fun requests for me.
There's not too much of a difference between a superhero and a soldier anyway! They're both perfect for my babies!
For all you know, there could be an entire squad of soldiers with my active camo in this room right now!
Pretty much all of my gadgets are camouflage friendly! Let me know if you need your support equipment to be "tacticool".
How about a pair of gloves that can stick to wet objects? No need to worry about dropping the soap! Ahaha!
I can develop a pair of running gloves! When your legs are tired, you can run with your arms instead!
Maybe a pair with laser pointer fingers, so you can distract the mob of stray cats that hang around in your back alley!
Perhaps a pair of auto-lubricating gloves could be useful, for when you don't want your grip to be tighter!
Maybe a pair of gloves capable of harnessing the power of multiple glowing shiny rocks! I might need a really heavy material for that...
Perhaps a pair of invisibility gloves! For when you don't want people to know where you're pointing!
I'm thinking of some flux capaciting gloves, so your hands don't fade out of existence if you mess with your time-line!
Wouldn't it be nice to have a pair of gloves that can do secret handshakes for you? I never have time to learn those...
A glove that can fire poison darts out its fingertips could be resourceful for reconnaissance missions!
Everyone could use plasma cutter detector gloves, so if you're about to be sliced to pieces by a plasma cutter, your gloves would detect it!
Let's try a bow woven out of a titanium alloy for strangling unsuspecting villains! Mint flavored to floss your teeth with in a bind!
Ever think of an electromagnetic conduction bow that can close the circuit of a live pipe bomb? I've already done that!
I've thought of a bowing bow that will pay respects for you if you ever find yourself suddenly petrified.
The sew bow! Can patch any sudden rips or tears in your costume! Not for those with a fear of needles...
I've always wanted a bow that could double as a tripwire for setting traps with, but I don't wear bows.
The faux bow! It looks like a bow, but it's actually a ribbon!
The glow bow! Shake it up and bend it a little, and you've got a portable light source!
The slow bow! Wrap it around a villain to slow their movement! This one will be tricky...
The toe bow! Like a regular bow, but for your toes! That's not particularly useful...
The throw bow! Throw the bow and entangle your foe!
How would you like a large purple W on your belt that can fire an embiggening ray?
The melt belt! With the press of a button it can melt anything not made of tungsten! Just don't press it while wearing it!
The smelt belt! Can detect who dealt it within a five kilometer radius!
I'm just one breakthrough away from my anti-gravity belt. I can't get it to look fashionable!
Everyone needs a belt that can detect radioactive spiders, right? Those things always have a talent for surprising me!
Perhaps a belt that can automatically adjust to a changing waist. Great for shape shifting quirks and thanksgiving dinner!
I could always use a bigger tool belt in the shop...does anyone know how Mary Poppins's bag works?
Maybe a denim belt for those who have oddly specific denim related quirks...
Who wouldn't want a tickle belt that can be locked onto a villain to punish them for any wrongdoing?
The belt of confusion! A belt with so many gadgets that it incapacitates any would-be belt thieves! I've made several of those...
I know! A bat hat! It provides the wearer an echolocated map of their surroundings!
What if I developed a normal looking baseball cap that could disguise any superhero walking out in public? No...that would never work.
Why hasn't someone developed a hat with a good sound system? Make headphones obsolete!
If I built a portal device into a hat, I could make a magician's job significantly more practical and impressive!
What about a hat that could be worn in other places than just your head?
I'm working on a hat that can envelope its wearer in a sound proof dome, but my current prototype just doesn't speak to me.
Wouldn't a swiss army hat be awesome?! Who needs an itty bitty pocket toy?
My rocket powered components don't translate to hats very well. Nobody wants to run around with a clunky chin strap!
Programming isn't my specialty but I can still make a pretty mean heads up display. Jarvis can eat my dick!
Night vision goggles are so primitive. Nighttime isn't the only low-vis situation! Why would you only address one of them?!
Maybe you've heard of these bad boys before - Electro Shoes! They'll have you gliding effortlessly through the air in no time at all!
It'll feel like you've been sent years into the future with these self-tying shoes!
Oh man, this one's a classic - rocket boots! Do I even need to explain what they do?
You'll never have to worry about getting gum on your shoes when they're made of gum! Walking might be a little tough though, but whatever!
How about these cat shoes! Making sure you always land on your feet... at least the first nine times!
Magneto-boots! I got this idea from a feisty little space cat - It lets you walk around on metal surfaces with ease!
Did you ever wish you were a little taller? You can finally look down on everyone else with these extendo-shoes!
What about some automatic runners, which run you to the place you're thinking about? Cool, right!?
These water-walkers will let you run across water whenever you exceed 767 miles per hour!
Sneaky Sneakers! They'll muffle your footsteps, perfect from when you're on a stealth mission, or stuck in a forest eating tree frogs!
Someone's been in a hurry to join me, huh?
This is something I've been looking forward to! Heeheehee!
Better late than never!
Pace yourself, ~name~, I'd like to join you soon!
Pace yourself, ~name~, I want to enjoy this!
Shall we race, ~name~? Ahaha!
Looks like ~name~ sure is enjoying himself!
I think we make a great team, ~name~!
Maybe one day my gadgets will be so effective that crime will be nonexistent. Then I can focus on more salacious inventions!
Eww! It's everywhere! I didn't even bring my roomba with me to clean this up!
Yes! I'll be with you shortly!
Please don't point that at me next time!
Well, now we know your quirk isn't winning poker games.
Wow. I'm trying to lose and you still managed to get there first. Bravo.
In a bit of a rush, aren't we?
Try not to distract me too much!
Too bad! For you, that is. All of us are going to enjoy this very much!
If only you had asked beforehand, I could have better equipped you for this event!
I doubt you can put on a better show than me, but I'd like to see you try!
I'm glad you're here to keep things interesting!
What a way to keep morale up!
What's this? Another defect?!
Now's a good time to watch and learn!
Interesting. Maybe I should try a move like that in the future!
Already? Okay then.
Soon, I'll show you what a REAL finish looks like!
Don't worry. Everyone gets a little carried away when they do this.
Excellent. Get ready for the grand finale!
The moment you've all been waiting for, is here!
I was planning to be the first to put on this kind of show, but I think I can still make a lasting impression!
Sit back and enjoy the show!
I don't normally test this kind of baby with an audience, but the feedback is helpful!
Normally it's not polite to stare, but this isn't a normal situation, is it?
Mmmmmmm
You may have heard these words before, but I'll teach you what they really mean! PLUS ULTRA!!!
Oh that was fun, but now I think I've shown off everything I wanted to.
That load would have made Power Loader proud!
Tony Stark? Pfft. Who needs a cave or a box of scraps? I could make that shit in my sleep!
Tony Stark? Pfft. Who needs a cave or a box of scraps? I could make that shit in my sleep!
Why read books all day when you could build a hydro-powered cyber engine? Makes no sense to me.
Every single one of my marvelous gadgets was self manufactured, you know!
Hit me up if you ever have any brilliant ideas. I'm always looking for new babies to develop!
I've been thinking of a gadget that can fuse hydrogen at room temperature, but there's just one major roadblock. I can't think of a clever name for it!
If you've ever wanted to snoop on your neighbors when they're getting too rowdy, I have a gadget for that.
Most of my dazzling creations are developed with hero work in mind, but I've developed a few babies that serve personal needs!
No hero could do their job without their support items! Every quirk has its weaknesses!
If you can't think outside the box, find a new box!
I think my beautiful babies speak for themselves, but if you have any questions, feel free to ask me any time!
When you really think about it, I'm a hero that helps other heroes! A double hero! Ahaha!
Most support course students go unrecognized, but I'm not an ordinary support course student!
Many species of bees will die to protect their hive! Just like a hero! Luckily, with my gadgets, you wouldn't need to rip your butt apart to save a life!
My favorite flavor of ice cream is vanilla because of versatility!
If worms had machine guns, they wouldn't be afraid of birds! Perfect example of why everyone needs a someone like me around!
All Might may have stayed out of retirement longer if he had given me a call!
Heroes are always so obsessed with their rankings, if anything, it just limits their way of thinking!
If you don't want people to eavesdrop into your conversations, just speak in binary.
Can you believe that some people walk out of their house without cybernetic pocket watches? The nerve!
If I could count the amount of times my babies have spontaneously combusted on one hand, I'd have a very large hand.
If you're tired of holding onto your cards, why not hold them with your feet instead?!
Thomas Edison may have designed a swimming pool, but it was in Florida, so who cares? That place is the penis of America!
Henry Ford is credited with the invention of the assembly line, but if he wanted robots to do his work, he should have just invented robots!
There's no sense in doing anything that a gadget can do for you!
If stupid villains weren't running around doing evil, I could spend my time solving real problems, like losing your tripolar screwdriver!
Who do you think designed that hydro-dynamic spatula with port and starboard attachments and turbo drive?
Huh? I came to show off my babies, not win this stupid game!
Everybody wins when they get to witness my remarkable babies first-hand!
